Tabslet

A jQuery plugin for tabs

download or view on GitHub

Tabslet is yet another jQuery plugin for tabs, is lightweight, is easy-to-use, is compatible with IE7+, Chrome, Firefox, Safari and jQuery 1.8.1, 1.9.1, 1.11.0, 2.1.0. and supports custom events, rotation, animation and controls

Demonstration

Default

$('.tabs').tabslet();
  • information
  • tab
  • tab

This is the default tab functionality.

Tab 2

Tab 3

Active

$('.tabs').tabslet({
	active: 2
});
  • tab
  • information
  • tab

Tab 1

The second tab is active when page loads.

Tab 3

Hover

$('.tabs').tabslet({
	mouseevent: 'hover',
	attribute: 'href',
	animation: false
});
  • information
  • tab
  • tab

Tabs change on mouse over...

Tab 2

Tab 3

Animation

$('.tabs').tabslet({
	mouseevent: 'click',
	attribute: 'href',
	animation: true
});
  • information
  • tab
  • tab

Change the tab to see that there is an animation.

Tab 2

Tab 3

Rotation

$('.tabs').tabslet({
	autorotate: true,
	delay: 3000
});
  • information
  • tab
  • tab

It's alive!

It's alive!!

It's alive!!!

Controls

$('.tabs').tabslet({
	controls: {
		prev: '.prev',
		next: '.next'
	}
});
previous next

  • tab

Custom Events

Custom event "_before"

$('.before_event').tabslet();
$('.before_event').on("_before", function() {
	// do stuff here
});
  • information
  • tab
  • tab

An alert message before the tab change...

TAB 2

TAB 3

Custom event "_after"

$('.after_event').tabslet({
	animation: true
});
$('.after_event').on("_after", function() {
	// do stuff here
});
  • information
  • tab
  • tab

An alert message is coming after the animation...

TAB 2

TAB 3

Use of data attribute to load

The attribute "data-toggle"
  • information
  • tab
  • tab

Just include the plugin and add the data attribute to your html tag!
